name: Family Gathering
description:
IMPORTANT: for the windows build rename the "Family Gathering" folder to "Family Gathering_Data"

Two siblings "Bob" and "Michelle"  need to "Join Together" with their father 

but there's a problem Bob can only move left and right and Michelle can only jump Help them solve puzzles to get to their father

Thanks to megasupy for being my teammate in this jam

||CONTROLS||

A&D = Left and Right (for Bob)

Space = Jump (for Michelle)
